column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Juno - Thank you for the great review! I'm glad you were able to visit us during a less-congested time
column2: though I will remind our servers that they need to better balance speed with efficiency. If you've ever worked in this industry
column3: you'd know every day is an opportunity to learn from our mistakes and improve. Thank you again and we hope to serve you again soon.
